titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Nathaniel Gaither, Jr.
CWG8497

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, Aug 12 1862.

Hon: Nat Gaither Jr
Sec State-

Thomas Forman 2d Lieut: is promoted (date of Com: Sep: 9. 1861.)
Christo: C. Hare Lieut: is promoted (date of Com: Oct 8. 1861)
Lieut: Richard Jones is dead (date of Com: Sep. 9. 1861.)
Lieut: Christo. Leonard promoted (date of Com: Sep. 9. 1861)

2
The following Comms: are issd. & delivered-
E Rumsey King 2d Lieut: dated Aug 12. 1862.
William Speed 2d_ Lieut: do -- do --
John W. Campbell 1st Lieut: & Qr Master date June 16. 1862_
Tho. T. Vinsont 1st Lieut: date 25 June 1862
John B. Campbell 1st Lieut: & Adjutant date Aug 12. 1862-
✓ Richd. L. Brady 2 Lieut. date 13 aug 1862
✓ Edwd Amendi 2 Lieut -- -- --
✓ Jos. W. Gill 2 Lieut: -- -- --
✓ E. B. Troyman 2 Lieut: -- -- --
✓ Washington Fithian 2 Lieut: -- --
✓ Jesse H. Berry_ 1 Lieut -- -- 11 --
✓ Tho. M. Oden_ do -- 8 --
✓ Wm Hamilton -- do -- 8 --
✓ O. P. Myers_ 2 Lieut -- 13 --
✓ John D. Pulliam do -- -- --
✓ Christo. C. Hare Captain -- 10 --
✓ Henry Watson 1st Lieut -- -- --
✓ James R. Farmer 2d Lieut -- -- --
✓ Ridgeley Wilson 1st Lieut: & Adjt -- 13 --
✓ John R. Smith 2d -- -- --
3)
Edgar Keenon 2 Lieut: date 13 Aug 1862_
Uriel Harrison " -- " " --
Wm J. Hurn Adjt -- -- -- --
J. C. Sayers Qr Mas. -- -- --
Weeden ONeil 2d Lieut -- --
W. G. Frank -- -- --
James M Watson -- -- --

Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl
